column4: Can someone tell me the best way to share Ubuntu files with Windows computers?
the best way to do it would be to ask your admin to "let" you into the windows network. you will still however need to use samba to share "your" folders with the windows network
to do this find your ip address , take it to the "network admin" pc and enter it as okay in system settings. on your computer attempt to "network". install samba, configure your shared folder
if you have no option to be let into the network you will have to -F in
